channel.title: Guys...we need TO STOP WITH CW SUGGESTIONS THAT ARE CONFIRMABLE
channel.description:
There's a big problem we are having
Confirmability.
And the problem with that is scum rely on some claims that are unconfirmable. Because unless you are a god and can fake mystic without ever using telepathy I think you may experience this.
Court wizards claim lul 2018. Physician who hasn't confirmed them as a healer in 3 days? Lul. Knight claim? Princess claim? These are problems we are having right now.
And the main reason why it's hard to get classes that are not confirmable. Is the fact that the most fun abilties, telepathy noble making a prince vote a hunter, are all confirmable
And i keep seeing suggestions for court wizard like , making a person not be able to appear in court. And you know what that is . CONFIRMABLE!!!
When making classes keep in mind that confirmablty is the problem we are having right now. They don't want court wizard to be confirmable.
And this is a tip to keep in mind for ANY CLASS YOU MAKE IN THE FUTURE.
